location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 24: Rawson Hart Boddam, John Torlesse, Robert Sparks, Charles Bourchier, James Morley and Alexander Callander, Council at Bombay, to Edward Galley, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: In this letter, received 5 April 1784, Edward Galley, Resident at Bushire, is informed that William Hornby has been succeeded as Governor of the Bombay Presidency by Rawson Hart Boddam.
